meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pudgy.
meanings.sent1: Her pudginesses made her look round and soft.
meanings.sent2: The baby's pudginesses were adorable and squishy.
meanings.sent3: Despite her pudginesses, she could still fit into her favorite dress.
meanings.sent4: The pudginesses of the teddy bear made it extra huggable.
meanings.sent5: The pudginesses of the puppy's belly jiggled as it ran around.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a slightly overweight or chubby appearance.
meanings.sent1: His pudginesses were more noticeable after the holidays.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel's pudginesses indicated a good harvest season.
meanings.sent3: The pudginesses of the snowman's belly made him look jolly.
meanings.sent4: The pudginesses of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The pudginesses of the raccoon's cheeks made it look like it was storing food for winter.
